level.heading: PARTICIPANT RECRUITMENT, CERTIFICATION AND REFERRAL (ยง 7-803)

level.text: The Department or any participating service deliverer (at the discretion of the Department) shall recruit program participants.
The Department shall be responsible for certifying the program eligibility of applicants and referring them to participating service deliverers.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 37 DCR 6949 (November 2, 1990).
